ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of MARIO DION of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the National Parole Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of three years; and designation of MARIO DION to be the Chairperson of the National Parole Board; effective May 29, 2006.
